statements: UPDATE web_analytics SET activity_type = 'click' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE web_analytics SET page_url = 'https://example.com/home' WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE web_analytics SET page_url = 'example.com/page1' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE web_analytics SET user_id = 100, page_url = 'example.com/page2', timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:30:00', activity_type = 'click' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE web_analytics SET action='clicked' WHERE user_id=1 AND page_id=5
UPDATE personalized_content SET personalized_text='Hello there!' WHERE user_id=3 AND content_id=10
UPDATE web_analytics SET action = 'clicked' WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_id = 456 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
UPDATE personalized_content SET personalized_text = 'Welcome to your personalized content dashboard' WHERE user_id = 789 AND content_id = 321;
UPDATE user_profiles SET birthdate = '1990-08-20', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE personalized_content SET content = 'Updated content' WHERE user_id = 101 AND content_id = 5
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'new.email@example.com', name = 'New Name' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE personalized_content SET content = 'New Content Updated' WHERE user_id = 456 AND content_id = 789;
UPDATE web_analytics SET action_type='click' WHERE page_url='example.com/page1';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', name='John Doe' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE web_analytics SET action='click' WHERE user_id=101 AND page_id=201 AND visit_timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE user_profiles SET age=30, email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE web_analytics SET action = 'page_view' WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_id = 456 AND visit_timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00'
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 789
